ComicInfo.Summary: From the minds that brought you DarkMinds comes the epic battle comic book fans have been waiting for! Three years ago, Dreamwave Productions envisioned a huge project involving literally dozens of characters and storylines. Characters and storylines which are all set in one place, Warlands, a fantasy world of myth and magic, inhabited by people of every mythical race imaginable, and threatened by an evil beyond comprehension. Dreamwave Productions proudly presents the first 12-issue story arc of Warlands. If you only buy one comic this summer, Warlands should be it! We guarantee that Warlands will be just as big a hit as DarkMinds, if not more so!
ComicInfo.Title: The Fall Of Shal Hazar
